meta.title: ZapNest Black Box — Curated Tech, Delivered
meta.description: Join the waitlist for ZapNest Black Box. Premium tech gadgets, ruthlessly curated. Monthly drops for those who demand more.

hero.headline: Tech That Earns Its Place
hero.subheadline: We test 50 gadgets. One makes the cut. Delivered monthly.

value_proposition.headline: Most Tech is Noise
value_proposition.body:
The market is flooded with gadgets that overpromise and underdeliver. Fake specs. Hype marketing. Disposable quality.

We filter the signal from the noise.

Every product in a ZapNest Box has been:
• Trend-validated across platforms
• Supplier-verified for quality
• Lab-tested against its claims
• Selected for real-world utility

If it doesn't pass, it doesn't ship.

steps.title: We Hunt
steps.description: Our AI scans Reddit, TikTok, and 50+ sources for emerging tech with genuine traction—not paid hype.

steps.title: We Vet
steps.description: Every candidate gets supplier verification, sample testing, and spec validation. Claims get checked.

steps.title: We Curate
steps.description: One hero product. Complementary accessories. Premium packaging. Zero filler.

steps.title: You Unbox
steps.description: Monthly delivery of tech that actually works. No research. No risk. Just the good stuff.

options.description: One curated accessory. Perfect entry point.
The full experience. Hero product + accessories.
Premium tier. Early access. Exclusive products.

founder_offer.headline: Founder Batch — Limited to 200
founder_offer.body:
The first ZapNest Core Box ships January 2025.

200 units. Founder pricing. First-mover access.

Founders get:
• Locked-in founder pricing (forever)
• First access to every drop
• Input on future product selection
• Exclusive founder badge

quotes.quote: Finally, someone doing the research I don't have time for.
quotes.author: Waitlist member

quotes.quote: The curation approach is exactly what's missing in Indian tech retail.
quotes.author: Waitlist member

items.q: What kind of products will be in the box?
items.a: Consumer tech that solves real problems: portable displays, smart chargers, audio gear, travel accessories. Nothing gimmicky. Everything tested.
Yes. No lock-in. Cancel before your next billing date and you're done.

items.q: What if I don't like a product?
items.a: 7-day returns, no questions asked. Quality issues get immediate replacement.

items.q: When does the first box ship?
items.a: Founder batch ships mid-January 2025. Waitlist members get first access.
Yes. Free shipping across India on all tiers.

footer_cta.headline: Join 500+ on the Waitlist
footer_cta.subtext: Early access. Founder pricing. No spam.

emails.subject: You're on the list
emails.body:
You're in.

You just joined {{waitlist_count}} others waiting for the first ZapNest Black Box.

Here's what we're doing:

→ Scanning 50+ products this month
→ Testing samples in our lab
→ Selecting 1 hero product that actually delivers
→ Packaging it like it deserves

Founder batch ships January 2025.

You'll hear from us when it's ready. No spam in between.

— ZapNest Team

P.S. Reply to this email if you have a product category you'd love to see us tackle.

emails.subject: We rejected 47 projectors
emails.body:
Quick update.

This week we evaluated 47 mini projectors.

43 had inflated specs (claimed 1080p, actual 720p).
3 had build quality issues.
1 had a defect rate we couldn't accept.

1 made the cut.

This is what we mean by curation. Not picking what looks good—testing until we find what actually is good.

The first Core Box hero product is nearly locked.

More soon.

— ZapNest

emails.subject: Founder spots are live
emails.body:
The Founder Batch is open.

200 Core Boxes. ₹2,999 each.

What's inside the first box:
• Mini Projector X — 720p HD, 3+ hours battery, 418g portable cinema
• 2 curated accessories (revealing soon)
• Premium magnetic packaging

Founder members lock in this price permanently. Every future box at founder rate.

You're on the early list. You get first access.

Window closes when spots fill or January 10—whichever comes first.

emails.subject: 67 founder spots left
emails.body:
Quick note:

133 founder spots claimed.
67 remaining.

We won't be restocking founder pricing. Once these are gone, it moves to regular pricing (₹3,499).

If you've been waiting—this is the time.

No pressure. Just wanted you to know before it's too late.

emails.subject: Final 24 hours
emails.body:
Last call.

Founder batch closes tomorrow at 11:59 PM.

23 spots remain.

After this:
• Price moves to ₹3,499
• No founder badge
• No locked-in pricing

This is the only time we're offering this.

Decision's yours.

instagram.text: Every ZapNest product survives this process...

instagram.question: What's worse?
instagram.option_a: Buying tech that breaks in a month
instagram.option_b: Spending hours researching to avoid that
